ai-tika-vin10t0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-vin10t0:4_0: worshipping the Buddha’s head, the best.
ai-tika-vin10t0:5_0: When the community of the community has created the Dhamma,
ai-tika-vin10t0:7_0: for the benefit of the monks is for the embodiment
ai-tika-vin10t0:8_0: I will speak in accordance with the Monastic Law,
ai-tika-vin10t0:10_0: Without doubts for the overcoming miracles the razor
ai-tika-vin10t0:11_0: this one who shows Emancipation in the highest degree:
ai-tika-vin10t0:13_0: The essentials amongst those who most precious.
ai-tika-vin10t0:16_0: Therefore it should be according to the Monastic Law (Discipline),
ai-tika-vin10t0:17_0: My mind is not free from delusion, I say.
